<!-- ===== Announcement (overlay on navbar center) ===== -->
<div id="announce" class="announce-on-nav" role="dialog" aria-label="Site announcement" hidden>

    <line x1="12" y1="8"  x2="12" y2="12" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <circle cx="12" cy="16" r="1.5" fill="currentColor"/>
  </svg>

  <button class="ann-close" type="button" aria-label="Dismiss">×</button>
</div>

<!-- Minimized (reopen) icon only -->
<div id="ann-toggle" class="announce-on-nav minimized noframe" role="button"
     aria-label="Open announcement" title="Open announcement" hidden>
  <svg class="icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" aria-hidden="true">
    <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="9" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="12" y1="7" x2="12" y2="13" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <circle cx="12" cy="17" r="1.6" fill="currentColor"/>
  </svg>
</div>

<style>
  .announce-on-nav{
    position: fixed;
    left: 50%;
    top: var(--ann-center-y, 48px);
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    z-index: 9999;

    display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: .6em;
    color: #07315c;
    font: 500 0.95rem/1.3 system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;
    min-height: 44px; padding: .6em 1em;
    border: 1px solid #bfd9ff; border-radius: .5em;
    box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,.18);
    white-space: nowrap; pointer-events: auto;

    background:
      linear-gradient(90deg,#0061ff 0%,#60efff 45%,#00f5a0 100%) top/100% 4px no-repeat,
      #eaf3ff;
  }
  .announce-on-nav a{ color:#c46800; font-weight:600; text-decoration:none; }
  .announce-on-nav a:hover{ text-decoration:underline; }
  .announce-on-nav .ann-close{
    margin-left:.25em; inline-size:28px; block-size:28px;
    border:0; border-radius:50%; background:transparent; color:inherit;
    font-size:1.2rem; line-height:1; cursor:pointer;
  }
  .announce-on-nav .ann-close:hover{ background:rgba(0,0,0,.08); }
  .announce-on-nav .icon{ width:20px; height:20px; flex:0 0 20px; }

  .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe{
    background: transparent;
    border: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
    padding: 0;
    inline-size: 36px; block-size: 36px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe .icon{
    width: 22px; height: 22px;
  }
  @media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference){
    .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe .icon{
      transition: transform .12s ease, opacity .12s ease;
    }
  }
  .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe:hover .icon{
    transform: scale(1.06); opacity: .95;
  }

  /* 深色模式 */
  @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark){
    .announce-on-nav{
      border-color:#294b73;
      background:
        linear-gradient(90deg,#3aa0ff 0%,#60efff 45%,#00f5a0 100%) top/100% 4px no-repeat,
        #0e2742;
      color:#e6f0ff;
    }
    .announce-on-nav a{ color:#ffb662; }
    .announce-on-nav .ann-close:hover{ background:rgba(255,255,255,.10); }
    .announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe{ background: transparent; }
  }

  /* 收起时 pill 吸附在 Yiwei Lu 右侧 */
  #name-anchor > #ann-toggle.announce-on-nav.minimized.noframe {
    position: absolute;
    left: calc(100% + 0.5em);
    top: 0.15em;
    transform: none;
  }
</style>

<!-- ✅ 仅增强 Contact 按钮（保持其它按钮不变） -->
<style>
  .connect-container a[href="/contact.html"].btn{
    --cta1:#0d6efd; --cta2:#3b82f6;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg,var(--cta1),var(--cta2));
    color:#fff;
    font-weight:800;
    border-radius:14px;
    padding:.78rem 1.25rem;
    box-shadow:0 12px 28px rgba(13,110,253,.32);
    transform:translateY(0);
    transition:transform .16s ease, box-shadow .16s ease, filter .16s ease;
    position:relative; isolation:isolate;
  }
  .connect-container a[href="/contact.html"].btn:hover{
    transform:translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow:0 16px 34px rgba(13,110,253,.42);
  }
  .connect-container a[href="/contact.html"].btn:active{
    transform:translateY(0);
    filter:brightness(.96);
  }
  .connect-container a[href="/contact.html"].btn:focus-visible{
    outline:3px solid rgba(13,110,253,.35);
    outline-offset:3px;
  }
  /* 轻微光带效果 */
  .connect-container a[href="/contact.html"].btn::after{
    content:""; position:absolute; inset:0; border-radius:14px;
    background:linear-gradient(120deg,transparent 0%,rgba(255,255,255,.35) 45%,transparent 60%);
    transform:translateX(-120%);
    transition:transform .5s ease;
    pointer-events:none; z-index:-1;
  }
  .connect-container a[href="/contact.html"].btn:hover::after{
    transform:translateX(120%);
  }
</style>

<script>
(() => {
  const VERSION = '2025-08-28-overlay-v1-svg-bgstrip';
  const KEY = 'announce:dismissed';
  const bar  = document.getElementById('announce');
  const pill = document.getElementById('ann-toggle');

  if (pill) pill.style.visibility = 'hidden';
  // ✅ 提前挂载到 name-anchor
  function mountPill() {
    const anchor = document.getElementById('name-anchor');
    if (!anchor || !pill) return false;
    if (pill.parentElement !== anchor) anchor.appendChild(pill);

    anchor.style.position = anchor.style.position || 'relative';
    return true;
  }

  if (!mountPill()) {
    const obs = new MutationObserver(() => {
      if (mountPill()) obs.disconnect();
    });
    obs.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true });
    window.addEventListener('load', mountPill);
  }

  function navEl(){
    return document.getElementById('quarto-header')
        || document.querySelector('header.navbar')
        || document.querySelector('.navbar.navbar-expand')
        || document.querySelector('header.site-header');
  }
  function positionOverNavbar(){
    const nav = navEl();
    const rect = nav ? nav.getBoundingClientRect() : { top: 0, height: 96 };
    const y = rect.top + rect.height / 2;
    document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--ann-center-y', `${y}px`);
  }

  try {
    const dismissed = localStorage.getItem(KEY);
    if (dismissed !== VERSION){
      bar.hidden = false; pill.hidden = true;
      document.documentElement.classList.add('ann-open');
    }
    else {
      bar.hidden = true; pill.hidden = false;
      document.documentElement.classList.remove('ann-open');
    }
  } catch { bar.hidden = false; }

  bar.querySelector('.ann-close').addEventListener('click', () => {
    bar.hidden = true; pill.hidden = false;
    document.documentElement.classList.remove('ann-open');
    try{ localStorage.setItem(KEY, VERSION);}catch{}
    positionOverNavbar();
  });
  pill.addEventListener('click', () => {
    bar.hidden = false; pill.hidden = true;
    document.documentElement.classList.add('ann-open');
    try{ localStorage.removeItem(KEY);}catch{}
    positionOverNavbar();
  });

  const nav = navEl();
  if (nav && 'ResizeObserver' in window) new ResizeObserver(positionOverNavbar).observe(nav);
  window.addEventListener('scroll', positionOverNavbar, { passive:true });
  window.addEventListener('resize', positionOverNavbar);
  window.addEventListener('load', positionOverNavbar);
  positionOverNavbar();

  requestAnimationFrame(() => {
    if (pill) pill.style.visibility = '';  
  });
})();
</script>
